Blog.post: Nick and I have gone to get the actual wedding bands (VERY EXCITING!!!) but I can help but feel sad. All this planning and all this buildup for 1 day. We have been planing for a year and a half. I 'm a little sad thats it's almost over I have to say! Nick has a new job, at a higher pay grade which is exciting! I am very happy with that. This being said, and I know this is the princess comming out in me I'm a little upset because we have to post pone the honey moon, (TO IRELAND!!!) While it's not being cancled only moved, I'm just bummed because I have had this vision in my head that you leave directly from the wedding to the honeymoon. EVEN though I know this is not the norm it still upsets me a bit. But now we think that we may go over St. Pats which should be fun! I am still looking for a new job. Selling dance shoes has just about worn out it's welcome. so here I go in to the big bad evil abyss of a ..."REAL JOB" ok thats it for the day.

Ok so I'm finaly Graduating College after 5 and a half years. So what does this mean? It means that I have to get a real Job. and I dont wanna. Ok kids take it from me a degree does not mean any thing!!! A bachlors degree will only get a job that might pay 20,000 a year. ARG!!! Oh well enough griping! I'm gonna try and work on this site a little more today
Links will be in the side, and hopefully a new pic of the day every day! Have a good night! Oh yeah I have discovered water colors, I love them, I will scan in some of my stuff. and show it
K here it is the start of something beautiful!!!! More to come!
I just ate there and I blew my points to hell! It was so good Ok not much more to report here is the pic of the day! My Left foot desperatly in need of a pedicure!

I was thinking today about some of the really good teachers that I have had and it's amazing how few there are for instance 2 in college 4 in high School 3 in middle school 2 in elem. School that's 11 out of probably 70 if you count all of them. that's kind of sad but good as well that those teachers really made that much of an impact on my life. In other news, Nick and I had our engagement pictures yesterday they are online now at: urlLink http://www.kcphoto.com/Wedding%20Clients/JessicaNick/wedding.htm On a similar note I just got my weight watchers kit. this dosent seem too hard. Here is the pic of the day My very first home grown produce!!!

urlLink http://www.newyorker.com/shouts/content/?040726sh_shouts This is great, even men of great power can be children!!! I love it! Went and bought bridal shower invites today. and Sent out wedding invitations yesterday and almost every one got theres today. This is AWSOME!!! OK so I guess since it's 12:14 am I can post a new pic of the day. Ah the reason a friend told me I was going to hell. I happen to beileve that God has sense of humor. so the Fish 'n' Chips is just honoring GOD! Have a good day:) J.

I woke up at 4:45 this morning God only know why. I havent been back to sleep and I dont like it my eyes are heavy but no sleepy for me. Now the sun is commin up maybe I'll sleep then. This is what I used to do when I lived at home. Stay up all night and sleep all day. My parent dubbed me the family vampire. ok thats it for now. Is any one reading this? Just wondering Jess Supertones sticker on a locker in side the UK fine arts building. I think this was in the music hallway.
Wow this is GREAT!!!! urlLink http://www.jibjab.com/thisland.html Check this out!
I have officaly gone on a diet me and 2 friends are each others motavation. so we will see how this goes. Here is the Picture of the Day. Nick trying to fix the weed eater.
Cute Zoe hiding under Stephs blanket. Boodika (sp?) giving zoe kisses. EVIL LOKI!!!!
Happy not Sad! Also I'm putting some kitty pictures up here of my friend stephs cats. Zoe and Evil Loki.

The Clean office, I am so sad that I cant get over it. Here is a picture! Note the "work station" in the corner Nick called it Mission Control. I like my little hole I have every thing I could ever want. Also notice the drafting table there is NOTHING on it. I can actually draw on it now. and do my water colors. Whoo Hoo.

Holy cow this is amazing! We moved in to this house on Feb. 1st this year and It has been a reck ever since!!! and Now... A FLOOR!! Whoo Hooo!!! The pig sty is almost livable, We can have photography clients in here now! I am totaly shocked!! I cant believe it. Picture to follow!
This was done after urlLink Sandra recomended I look at urlLink French toast Girl's website. And I think i've got a pretty neat new look and feel! Let me know what you think! thanks
Agirl called Jess now has a new mascot thanks to urlLink Sandra!
Here is the laundry art peice that I did see below. Keep in mind this is my first time playing with illistrator.

I need to display my portfolio, but I am unsure as far as how to do it. I have pictures, web design, and drawings and paintins as well as fashion designs and sketches. If any one has any Ideas please leave a comment!!! Thanks
I just figured out that when not using my form for clothes making, It makes a great drying rack for things that cant go in the dryer . oh yeah and it looks good with the irish dance wig!

Agirl called jess may just have a new mascot! I guessed the AMAZING Sandra's new G-Mail account and I get a gift pic! Awsome!!! Check out her site on the side there! Ghillie Studio Also she did some awsome designs for the wedding show nick and I are about to do!

I just realized I hadn't posted since Friday! Life is busy! Worked all day Saturday(real job) and Sunday(photography), I just put in a application at UK and all looks good so far! I'm really excited! It's for a Graphic Design Technician Senior in the alumni house! Should be fun! Keep your fingers crossed! I have forty tons of laundry (think Jessica Simpson proportions!) Only problem no second floor to throw it all over! So it piled in my kitchen I may just have to do an art piece for this, I don't think I'm brave enough to take a picture! Things are gearing up for the wedding! Less then 2 months ACK!!! So much to do so little time! Ok back to the laundry! here's you pic! distillery out side of the human resources building for the state employment dept. KY

I get to work and get a call froom my bank saying that I am over drawn then I spill bbq sauce on my pants at lunch, and then the new girl drives me nutzo!!!! AHHHHH will this day ever end. I have tomorrow off thank god! one more picture from this weekend. I told you it was going in my blog!!!!! he he!

Not much today, I am training a new girl at work. I still dont have those sites done., And my house is a mess. Oh yeah and we are out of butter for my eggo. So bleh. Have a good day... Ah a beautiful after noon, in Lexington , KY here is the tree in front of my house!

Ok yeah I'm a slacker, on the bloging front! Here is your picture I was pretty proud of this taken with my little cool pix. i've been toying with buying a D100 but they stoped making them wich may be a good thing, and maybe just maybe the price will go down! In other news I went to my first kempo class last night. Pretty fun but I am sore like you wouldent believe. My friend who sugested I go kind of forgot to tell me about the 100 push ups and the 200 crunches. Neither have I done since high school which was 6 years ago!!!!! Now that I am not in school, I am looking for more dance classes to get in shape. So in adition to Kempo and Irish Dance which starts back up soon, I am looking in to a Ballett, Tap, and a Jazz Class. I'm hoping I can be dancing or something 5 nights a week. So thats where Im at. I am busy like EVERY week end until the wedding so I figured I might as well fill up the day as well! Oh yeah and I have 2 web sites that need to be done by monday. So that I can GRADUATE !!!! YEAH I will have a bachlors!!! Ok thats it. Have a nice day!

So I just got a letter from the urlLink college of communications saying that I have completed all requirements for my BA in telecommunications, and that I will receive my diploma in early to mid October! I should be psyched! But no, now I am more depressed! I am in a retail job that I loved because they worked with my school schedule, and that was great. Now however, I am just there, I have no where to go. School is over. It's a strange feeling. Your whole life is planned out for you, urlLink preschool , urlLink grade school , urlLink middle school , urlLink high school , urlLink college . But after that it's kind of like your an adult make your own decisions! And well I don't wanna! I've put in full time applications but so far have heard nothing. And well I'm scared is this what the rest of my life is to be. I am to grow up and go to a job and come home to my husband and that's it! I'm too young for this! I'm only 23!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Now don't get me wrong love nick more then anything and I cant wait to be married to him (September 25,2004 BTW) and I do have other activities, but I feel as though my child hood is just gone. And it happened in a week! What the hell happened! Oh well enough on that, I still have wedding stuff to stress about! My dress wont be in until the last weekend of this month and the brides maids dresses wont be in until 2 weeks before the ceremony! ARG!!!!! ok that's it here's your pic! I know they are grainy but I still think its an awsome picture. This was from ballet under the stars in woodland park.
